edgar thama prithiya digatama pawathwa ganimin pawasanne thama gahanu lamayeku samanga sawas waruwe awidinna yana bawayi.ohuge mawa wisin wada wadi prithiyak penwanne ee karanawa sambandhayeni.edgar hamu wanne yanne helan gandiwayi.oba aawa thadin mathakaye thaba gatha yuthuya.ee edgar aa kerehi badunu sith athi nisa nowe.aa wisin me sinamapataya pura sidu karannata yedena karyabharaya hethuweni.
